entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:50 p.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low 10. POP 40%

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle early in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:23 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 8:23 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
